posts.post_content:
Looking for a crease/wrinkle free card with decent centering and nice color. I have a PSA 3.5 Lajoie Throwing I can include in a cash/trade deal. Also willing to purchase outright. PM or email [url]adamwanaselja@gmail.com[/url] if you have one to move. 

Thanks. Adam.
I know it’s a long shot but I’m running this up again.
